data.name: I am Your King
data.detailed_description: Be a King and rally your countrymen to fight on the field of battle. Build an army and survive as long as you can while defeating the invading enemies, kill points are multiplied by the size of your army at the time of the kill.
data.about_the_game: Be a King and rally your countrymen to fight on the field of battle. Build an army and survive as long as you can while defeating the invading enemies, kill points are multiplied by the size of your army at the time of the kill.
data.short_description: Be a King and rally your countrymen to fight on the field of battle. Build an army and survive as long as you can while defeating the invading enemies, kill points are multiplied by the size of your army at the time of the kill.
data.reviews:
“Simple yet unique concept. love the graphics, especially the dragon silhouette. Great time killer!”
5/5 – DanniCakes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb video memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb video memory
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux (tarball installation)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 core, 256mb video memory
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: PulseAudio
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
